page.title: 19Heating our homes.
page.content: Some use a variety of heating methods in their homes during the year. Out of 26 children 20 used some form of{electrical heating}and 3 had electrical central heating. 13 homes had{gas mains}supply with 8 using it for full central heating.Only 1 had an {oil}fired rayburn on which you could cook as well but no oil central heating. 5 had{tank}or a form of {bottle gas}heating fires.13 had coal fires with 2 having central heating systems. 3 had{wood burning stoves with 1 running a central heating system. Over half the class had central heating.This means heating the whole house by radiators through hot water pipes.
